name: Vectro Blast
description:
Vectro Blast is a retro arcade action shooter game with one goal: Get as high score as possible.

Your objective is to destroy waves of enemy ships, which keep growing and getting stronger each wave.

Unique enemies

There are six different enemies waiting to see what you got. Everyone has a different combat style. Each new enemy type has more deadly combat behave, than the previous.

Weapon system

You won’t start the game with just one weapon, but with three at once! However you should be careful, some of them have limited ammo.

Powerful elites

Soon you will find out that there are even stronger and unique ships! We call them elites and they spawn much more rarely than usual enemies.

Upgrade your ship

Your ship is your hope. Keep looting yellow tokens, which drop from enemies. You can use them to buy upgrades that will allow you to get to higher waves more easily and get even better score.

Loot power-ups

Keep looking for blue tokens, because they can provide you with a nice boost! There are many kinds of power-ups and they spawn randomly.
